articles.title: Cineworld joins Odeon in refusing to show Universal films over Trolls World Tour row - The Independent
articles.description: Chain could reject new Jurassic World, Fast & Furious and Halloween movies
articles.content:
Cineworld has joined AMC and Odeon in deciding to reject new films made by Universal in light of comments made by the distributors CEO following the home release of Trolls World Tour.

articles.title: Liam and Noel Gallagher Argue Over Lost Oasis Demo - Ultimate Classic Rock
articles.description: Former Oasis bandmates Liam and Noel Gallagher started a new dispute over the release of unfinished 2009 track “Don’t Stop in April 2020.
articles.content:
Liam and Noel Gallagher found themselves in another sibling argument after Noel released a lost Oasis demo titled Dont Stop.
The unfinished song features Noels voice and guitar, opening with the lines, Bye, bye, my friend, I'm leaving / Im gonna feast on the… [+1524 chars]

articles.title: Cineworld Sends Furious Message To Universal Following Major Dispute - LADbible
articles.description: The cinema chain says it will not show films that 'fail to respect theatrical windows'
articles.content:
Cineworld is the latest cinema chain to slam Universal Pictures following an argument over 'theatrical windows' - the usual time delay between a film's theatrical release and its debut on streaming and on-demand services.
All cinemas have had to close as a r… [+2064 chars]
